method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the fields to their default value.

field.name: IsInitialized
field.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _cancel
method.comment: Instructs the WebView to cancel the authentication request. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. Pass android.webkit.HttpAuthHandler from Java inline code to initialize instance. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _proceed
method.comment: Instructs the WebView to proceed with the authentication with the given credentials. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _toobject
method.comment: Returns Object as android.webkit.HttpAuthHandler which can be used in Java Code. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _usehttpauthusernamepassword
method.comment: Gets whether the credentials stored for the current host. Added in API level 1.
